stories.text:
I have been using Firefox Developer Edition since 2018. As time goes on, I notice every UI change seems to be an imitation of Google Chrome. Most recently, the popups used for stuff like SSO.

I don't have a strong opinion on the changes, but I will say this, I had ZERO issue with how Firefox used to look.

Am I missing something here? Do most of you consider Google Chrome to be the state of the art for web browser UI/UX?
stories.title: Is Google Chrome's UI Superior to Firefox?
